basics.name: Sara Johnson
basics.headline: Data Scientist at AI Research Lab
basics.summary: Experienced data scientist with expertise in machine learning and AI, focusing on natural language processing and computer vision applications.

Specialized in statistical modeling and data analysis.

recommendations.author: John Davis

recommendations.text: Sara is an exceptional data scientist with deep technical knowledge and excellent communication skills.
